Key Match Events: The Rockets collectively underperformed as they trailed 62-41 after the end of the first two quarters.
Castle had significant impact on both ends of the floor, hitting crucial free throws, the last of which gave the Spurs a 109-106 lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Sheppard, benched by Udoka, watched helplessly from the sidelines as the Rockets couldn't complete their comeback.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Reed Sheppard and the Houston Rockets got their first look at Victor Wembanyama and the revamped San Antonio Spurs on Saturday.
The No. 3 pick in the 2024 NBA draft started the second quarter but missed both attempts, including a 3-pointer.
Others: Ime Udoka benched Reed Sheppard while Gregg Popovich kept Stephon Castle late in the closely fought game
The game between the San Antonio Spurs and the Houston Rockets had an interesting sub-heading.
Many looked forward to the matchup between Reed Sheppard and Stephon Castle, who the Spurs picked after Sheppard went to Houston.
